Basic Guide

Click space to reveal more content within a slide.
Text which is highlighted or italicized signifies a key word or something important.
 Some text can link back to previous slides.
 Throughout the presentation, some demos will be available to help visualize concepts.
 The arrow keys or 'a' and 'd' can be used to quickly switch slides, and the section
title in the footer can be clicked to return back to the navigation page.
